aws_services: CloudWatch (Logs, Metrics, Alarms, Dashboards, Metric Filters)
training_quality_justification: Strong modular infrastructure code with 15+ AWS services, but BLOCKED due to: (1) IDEAL_RESPONSE.md contains AI-generated formatting (tables, TOC, excessive documentation) instead of code-focused content as required, (2) Flow logs disabled reducing monitoring completeness, (3) Original metadata had incorrect AWS services list. Code quality is 9/10 but documentation issues reduce training value to 7/10, below 8/10 threshold.
code_review_issues: CRITICAL: lib/IDEAL_RESPONSE.md is AI-generated with tables and TOC (violates human-written requirement)
HIGH: VPC Flow Logs disabled (enable_flow_logs=false) - monitoring incomplete
MEDIUM: Original aws_services metadata was incorrect (listed S3, CloudFormation not used in code)
author: raaj1021
